title: Power up all your Apple gear with this gorgeous Anker charging station
content:
Macworld

A clean desk can help with productivity, and that’s exactly what this tiny and gorgeous Anker MagGo magnetic 8-in-1 charging station is. Now that it’s available for $56 for Prime members instead of the regular $100, this is not a product you want to miss out on.

First of all, let’s discuss this product’s design because it’s absolutely gorgeous. It’s a tiny sphere about the size of a HomePod Mini with a 15W wireless charger on the front. The MagSafe-compatible charger has Qi2 certification, so it will safely and quickly charge your iPhone. On the back of the magnetic pad, you’ll notice a whole slew of ports and outlets. In fact, there are a total of three outlets on there, positioned in such a way that you won’t have issues fitting anything in.

There are also two USB-A and two USB-C ports for all the things that need some juice every now and then, including your keyboard and mouse. You can even plug in your Apple Watch charger if you want to, or, better yet, your MacBook. The Anker MagGo charging station delivers 67W full-speed charging, which is ideal for taking your MacBook Air to 50% in less than half an hour.

So go ahead and snatch this amazing Anker MagGo charging station for $56 at Amazon, a special price for Prime members. If you haven’t subscribed yet, you can start a 30-day free trial at any point to test it out.
